name: Diplodocus
description: The Diplodocus is a gargantuan beast known for its immense size and strength, characterized by its heavy build and imposing presence.
memorable: Its powerful stomp and tail attacks can control the battlefield by knocking foes prone and pushing them away.
goals: To dominate the battlefield through brute force and crowd control.
relations: May be encountered in herds or alongside other prehistoric creatures.
environment: Typically found in prehistoric or vast open environments.
strengths: High Strength allows it to deal significant melee damage; very high hit points make it tough to defeat.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity results in poor agility and movement, limiting its effectiveness in quick encounters.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack with a powerful stomp and a sweeping tail that can knock opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to take two actions in one turn with its Multiattack, dealing significant damage across multiple foes.
senses: Possesses passive Perception of 11, allowing basic environmental awareness.
additional_information: Exceptional Strength of 24 increases physical prowess.
Can push targets away with its tail attack.
Low Intelligence indicates a lack of cognitive skills.
High Constitution contributes to its durability.
A formidable presence on the battlefield.

massive beast with crowd control abilities
